Docs.summary: Manages project persistence and stores and retrieves code and other items using save and load operations implemented by the host.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string LoadElement(string name) cil managed
Public Function LoadElement (name As String) As String

Docs.param: The name of the code item to be loaded. This can be a null reference when loading the Project file.
Docs.summary: Gets the source string previously saved using the SaveElement method.
Docs.returns: The contents of the source-code element associated with the name parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SaveElement (string name, string source);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SaveElement(string name, string source) cil managed
Public Sub SaveElement (name As String, source As String)
public: void SaveElement(System::String ^ name, System::String ^ source);
abstract member SaveElement : string * string -> unit

Docs.param: A name to associate with the specified source item. This can be a null reference when saving the Project file.
The source string for the item.
Docs.summary: Saves an arbitrary source string with a given name parameter, which can then be used in a call to the LoadElement method to reload the string.
